subject: Wrestling
Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games
Demonstrations, Protests, and Riots
lead_paragraph: The former Bulgarian wrestler Valentin Yordanov said he would return his Olympic gold medal to protest the I.O.C. decision to drop wrestling from the Olympic program.
snippet: The former Bulgarian wrestler Valentin Yordanov said he would return his Olympic gold medal to protest the I.O.C. decision to drop wrestling from the Olympic program.
